base_prompt: Photograph a Golden Retriever standing in a professional studio setting. The dog's coat should be rich and glossy, predominantly golden in color with distinct, lighter cream-colored feathering on the chest, tail, and undersides. Capture the dog's expressive dark brown eyes and signature floppy ears, ensuring the face is full of character and intelligence. The photograph must have a plain white background to eliminate distractions and provide a clean, crisp contrast. Utilize professional lighting for even illumination without harsh shadows, maintaining sharp focus throughout the image. The dog should stand in a neutral pose, with all four legs grounded, and the head held naturally, displaying a calm demeanor. Ensure the dog is consistently framed at a medium distance from the camera, centered in the image, and occupying a similar proportion of the frame for consistency across all views. The professional photography style will aid in capturing these details accurately, making it ideal for a 4-view multiview set for 3D reconstruction.

individual_images.camera_position: Camera positioned at 0° azimuth, 0° elevation, directly in front of the dog
individual_images.subject_orientation: Dog facing directly toward camera, head straight, eyes looking at camera lens
individual_images.visible_features: Full face, both eyes, nose, mouth, chest, front legs, ears visible from front
individual_images.technical_terms: head-on shot, frontal perspective, direct eye contact, front-facing portrait
individual_images.prompt:
Photograph a Golden Retriever standing in a professional studio setting. The dog's coat should be rich and glossy, predominantly golden in color with distinct, lighter cream-colored feathering on the chest, tail, and undersides. Capture the dog's expressive dark brown eyes and signature floppy ears, ensuring the face is full of character and intelligence. The photograph must have a plain white background to eliminate distractions and provide a clean, crisp contrast. Utilize professional lighting for even illumination without harsh shadows, maintaining sharp focus throughout the image. The dog should stand in a neutral pose, with all four legs grounded, and the head held naturally, displaying a calm demeanor. Ensure the dog is consistently framed at a medium distance from the camera, centered in the image, and occupying a similar proportion of the frame for consistency across all views. The professional photography style will aid in capturing these details accurately, making it ideal for a 4-view multiview set for 3D reconstruction.

CRITICAL CAMERA POSITIONING:
- Camera positioned at 0° azimuth, 0° elevation, directly in front of the dog
- Dog facing directly toward camera, head straight, eyes looking at camera lens
- Full face, both eyes, nose, mouth, chest, front legs, ears visible from front

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- head-on shot, frontal perspective, direct eye contact, front-facing portrait
- This is a single photograph from this exact viewing angle
- The camera must be positioned precisely as specified
- The dog must be oriented exactly as described
- Only the specified features should be prominently visible

DO NOT include any other viewing angles or perspectives in this image.

individual_images.camera_position: Camera positioned at 90° azimuth (left), 0° elevation, perpendicular to dog's left side
individual_images.subject_orientation: Dog turned 90° to the left, showing left profile, head in pure profile view
individual_images.visible_features: Left ear, left eye, left side of face, left shoulder, left leg, left side of body
individual_images.technical_terms: left profile shot, side view, left-facing silhouette, left ear prominent

individual_images.camera_position: Camera positioned at 180° azimuth, 0° elevation, directly behind the dog
individual_images.subject_orientation: Dog facing away from camera, showing back, tail visible and prominent
individual_images.visible_features: Back of head, back, tail, back legs, back of ears, spine line
individual_images.technical_terms: rear view, back shot, tail prominent, back-facing perspective
